description: |-
  Data source for an ArubaCloud Key.
---

---
page_title: "arubacloud_key"
subcategory: "Security"
description: |-
  Data source for retrieving information about an ArubaCloud Key.
---

```terraform
data "arubacloud_key" "example" {
  id         = "key-12345"
  project_id = arubacloud_project.main.id
  kms_id     = arubacloud_kms.main.id
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema


### Arguments

The following arguments are supported:

#### Required

- `id` (String) Key identifier
- `kms_id` (String) ID of the associated KMS
- `project_id` (String) ID of the project this Key belongs to

### Attributes Reference

In addition to all arguments above, the following attributes are exported:

#### Read-Only

- `algorithm` (String) Encryption algorithm
- `description` (String) Key description
- `name` (String) Name of the Key
- `size` (Number) Key size in bits
- `status` (String) Key status
- `uri` (String) Key URI
